testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.quote: Rrish's 'Guided Independence' approach completely changed how I think about learning music. I went from being intimidated by improvisation to actually enjoying it and feeling confident to express myself. His patience and structured teaching style made all the difference.

testimonials.name: James R.
testimonials.quote: As someone who's always been analytical, I appreciated how Rrish breaks down improvisation into understandable concepts without losing the creative magic. After 18 months of lessons, I'm now jamming with friends and even writing my own music.

testimonials.name: Maria C.
testimonials.quote: Learning online with Rrish has been incredible. Despite the distance, he provides such clear guidance and feedback. His teaching style really resonates with how I learn best. I've made more progress in 6 months than I did in years of trying to learn on my own.

details.favoriteAspect: Clear progression and online lesson quality

testimonials.name: David K.
testimonials.quote: At 62, I thought it might be too late to learn guitar seriously. Rrish proved me completely wrong. His patient, systematic approach helped me develop skills I never thought possible. Now I'm playing blues that moves people - including myself!

details.favoriteAspect: Patient teaching suited for adult learners

testimonials.name: Lucy T.
testimonials.quote: Music is my escape from a stressful job, and Rrish understood that from day one. He's helped me not just learn techniques but discover what kind of player I want to be. The emotional connection I've developed with my playing has been life-changing.

testimonials.name: Alex P.
testimonials.quote: Rrish is an amazing teacher who really gets how young people learn. He's helped me develop my own style while building solid technical foundations. Plus, his flexibility with scheduling worked perfectly with my uni timetable.
